Stumble Home

Status: Demo
Software Used: Unity, Photoshop, VisualStudio
Languages Used: C#
Textures: Amy Dolphin
Game Jam 2019 Page: Stumble Home

This was my first participation in a Game Jam. We were lucky enough to have the Games Technology computer lab all weekend and were provided with pizza by our lecturers. I had alot of fun trying to make this game over the weekend.

The theme for the Game Jam was "What home means to you?". We came up with the idea that home is a place where you can always return to no matter what. We loosly interpreted this idea into a game where you've stayed out late and you have to complete tasks and get to bed without waking up your parents or your baby sibling.
